text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea montigena is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sulawesi and the Maluku Islands in Indonesia.
text.References:
Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea montigena". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33426A9783515. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33426A9783515.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
